titleNullable: Flu Activity in the United States: 2010-2015
descriptionNullable:
### About this dataset
This dataset contains information on flu activity in the United States from 2010 to 2015. It includes data on the number of ILI cases, the percentage of ILI cases, and the number of patient visits

### How to use the dataset
This dataset contains information on flu activity in the United States from 2010 to 2015. The data includes the number of ILI cases, the percentage of ILI cases, the number of sites reporting, the region of the country, and the release week

### Research Ideas
1.Analyzing flu activity trends over time
2.Determining which regions of the country are most affected by the flu
3.Identifying which age groups are most likely to be affected by the flu

### Acknowledgements
This dataset is published by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)





### Columns



_____

**File: ILI_2010_2011.csv**
| Column name              | Description                                                 |
|:-------------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Release_Week**         | The week the data was released. (Date)                      |
| **Release_Week**         | The week the data was released. (Date)                      |
| **Region**               | The region the data is from. (String)                       |
| **Region**               | The region the data is from. (String)                       |
| **Sites_Reporting**      | The number of sites reporting. (Integer)                    |
| **Sites_Reporting**      | The number of sites reporting. (Integer)                    |
| **Total_Patient_Visits** | The total number of patient visits. (Integer)               |
| **Total_Patient_Visits** | The total number of patient visits. (Integer)               |
| **Total_ILI**            | The total number of influenza-like illness cases. (Integer) |
| **Total_ILI**            | The total number of influenza-like illness cases. (Integer) |
| **Perc_Unweighted_ILI**  | The percentage of unweighted ILI cases. (Float)             |
| **Perc_Unweighted_ILI**  | The percentage of unweighted ILI cases. (Float)             |
| **Perc_Weighted_ILI**    | The percentage of weighted ILI cases. (Float)               |
| **Perc_Weighted_ILI**    | The percentage of weighted ILI cases. (Float)               |
